main event: Sgt Turner observed a flying saucer that appeared to be a formation of five aircraft with large red lights on 29 March 1950 at Maxwell AFB.
interesting points: The object was heading approximately 335 degrees and flew silently., The witness initially thought it was a formation of five aircraft but later lost sight of some due to transmission lines., The object was reported to have 10-12 large red lights., The event occurred at 2030 hours CST without additional reports from other aircraft in the area., The sighting was deemed insufficient data as other tower personnel did not confirm seeing the objects.
